subtitle_list.text: In the wild unpredictability of modern life, you can't afford to mess around with anti-perspirant that doesn't get the job done.
Well, with Old Spice Sweat Defense Dry Spray, you get ridiculously long-lasting sweat protection you can count on.
Just spray and observe as Old Spice takes command of your armpits with fast-acting protection that goes on dry so you can get back to business.
Old Spice Sweat Defense Dry Spray. Smell ready for anything.
